Core Features

Unlock Your Full Potential

StudyTrack offers a suite of powerful tools designed to make your exam preparation focused, efficient, and enjoyable.

AI Tools That Think Like a Mentor

Leverage cutting-edge AI to supercharge your study process. Get smart syllabus suggestions, instant material summaries, and generate custom quizzes tailored to your needs.

  • AI Syllabus Suggester: Personalized plans for NEET, JEE, UPSC.
  • Study Material Summarizer: Grasp key concepts quickly.
  • Quiz Generator: Test yourself with difficulty & exam filters.
Try AI Tools Now

Gamified Study Experience

Turn study into an adventure! Earn XP for completing Pomodoros, acing quizzes, and consistent planning. Unlock prestigious badges and climb the leaderboards.

  • Earn XP: For Pomodoros, quizzes, and planning tasks.
  • Unlock Badges: Show off achievements like "Planner Pro" & "Quiz Master".
  • Leaderboards: Compete with peers and stay motivated.
See Gamification Features

Your Personal Progress Wall

Visualize your dedication and growth. Track your study streaks with a heatmap, monitor Pomodoro sessions, and get insightful weekly reviews.

  • Heatmap Streak Tracker: Like GitHub, but for your studies!
  • Pomodoro Counter: See your focused hours accumulate.
  • Weekly Review Panel: Reflect and plan for continuous improvement.
Visualize Your Growth

SmartQuiz AI (Enhanced & Coming Soon)

An advanced quiz generator is on its way! Features topic selection, difficulty/exam filters (NEET, UPSC, JEE), real-time scoring, detailed explanations, and leaderboard integration.

  • Topic-based quizzes with customizable difficulty.
  • Exam-specific modes: NEET, UPSC, JEE & more.
  • Instant scoring, explanations, and progress tracking.

Unlock your personal AI productivity coach after 7 days of consistent use! This premium tool analyzes your study time, common distractions, and focus trends to provide personalized weekly feedback.
